parameters.name: AtStart
parameters.description: True to extend b-spline curve from start point, false to extend b-spline curve from end point

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: Length by which to extend b-spline curve

parameters.name: LinearExt
parameters.description: True if the extension is linear, false if not

title: ICurve.ExtentCurve
description: Extends a b-spline curve by the specified length.
signature:
Curve ExtentCurve( 
   System.Boolean
AtStart
,
   System.Double
Length
,
   System.Boolean
LinearExt
)

parameters.name: AtStart
parameters.description: True to extend b-spline curve from start point, false to extend b-spline curve from end point

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: Length by which to extend b-spline curve

parameters.name: LinearExt
parameters.description: True if the extension is linear, false if not

returns: Pointer to newly extended ICurve object
remarks: This method only affects b-spline curves. For all other types of curves, this method does nothing.
